Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences Mathematics Graduate Course Descriptions
Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences Mathematics Graduate Course Descriptions

This page features graduate course offerings for New York University's Courant School of Mathematics, including descriptions, prerequisites, and required and recommended texts. There is also information about time and instructor for each course. Because this page is hosted on the Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences site, there are links to other resources for students in this or other mathematics degree programs offered at Courant.
